column5: Just wondering if there's anybody out there that fishes the winnipeg river or english river below caribou falls and below whitedog dam including tetu lake. Not really interested in anything above.Anybody familar with the area and could point me towards some fish?

Been there twice and our group is going back this year staying at caribiou falls. Fishing has been good both times. Did most of the fishing from just below the dam to just past the lodge. It did not seem to matter where just in the river channell on either side. Current is very fast I would bring a ton of large jigs 3/8 oz plus, color does not matter much. Will be going up in August.
